info.name: Rainbowdash.net split videosync view
info.description: Divides the site into two panes - the timeline on the left, and the RDNStream on the right. (Only affects the public timeline. Requires a screen at least 800px wide. Preview screenshot shows extra functions not accessible to regular site members.)
info.additionalInfo:
Changelog 11/18/13:
-Special case certain changes to only apply on smaller screens where they're useful
